subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: evp - the clear

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1

Yes they call it "the fountain" I call it "the fishtank" =)
   
  It's a large tank pumping water thru a charcoal filter (a bit like charli's coffee pot did). I then save the recording, put it thru the p1 filter, and listen then slow to -74% and listen. Thats the speed for most messages...forward and reverse. -30% also gets results sometimes depending on how many come thru.
   
  Misty

Staten Island Paranormal <SIParanormalSociety@...> wrote:
          I definitely hear the first one clearly. The second one starts out 
very clear, but I can't make out the end. I couldn't make out the 
last one at all!

When you say you use water, do you mean you run water while doing 
EVP? 

Amy
SI Paranormal

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Did a session today using only water and had some good results 
which I will be posting as attachments to this email.
> 
> These are pretty darn clear for me how about you?
> Misty
>
